verses.t: Be ye{G1096} followers{G3402} of me{G3450}, even as{G2531} I also{G2504} am of Christ{G5547}.

Now{G1161} I praise{G1867} you{G5209}, brethren{G80}, that{G3754} ye remember{G3415} me{G3450} in all things{G3956}, and{G2532} keep{G2722} the ordinances{G3588}, as{G2531} I delivered{G3860} them to you{G5213}.

But{G1161} I would have{G2309} you{G5209} know{G1492}, that{G3754} the head{G3588} of every{G3956} man{G435} is{G2076} Christ{G3588}; and{G1161} the head{G2776} of the woman{G1135} is the man{G3588}; and{G1161} the head{G2776} of Christ{G5547} is God{G3588}.
Every{G3956} man{G435} praying{G4336} or{G2228} prophesying{G4395}, having{G2192} his head{G2776} covered{G2596}, dishonoureth{G2617} his{G846} head{G3588}.

But{G1161} every{G3956} woman{G1135} that prayeth{G4336} or{G2228} prophesieth{G4395} with{G3588} her head{G2776} uncovered{G177} dishonoureth{G2617} her{G1438} head{G3588}: for{G1063} that is{G2076} even all{G2532} one{G1520} as if{G3587} she{G846} were shaven{G3587}.

For{G1063} if{G1487} the woman{G1135} be{G2619} not{G3756} covered{G2619}, let her{G2751} also{G2532} be shorn{G2751}: but{G1161} if{G1487} it be a shame{G150} for a woman{G1135} to be shorn{G2751} or{G2228} shaven{G3587}, let her be covered{G2619}.

For{G1063} a man{G435} indeed{G3303} ought{G3784} not{G3756} to cover{G2619} his head{G3588}, forasmuch as he is{G5225} the image{G1504} and{G2532} glory{G1391} of God{G2316}: but{G1161} the woman{G1135} is{G2076} the glory{G1391} of the man{G435}.
For{G1063} the man{G435} is{G2076} not{G3756} of{G1537} the woman{G1135}; but{G235} the woman{G1135} of{G1537} the man{G435}.
Neither{G2532} was{G2936} the man{G435} created{G2936} for{G1223} the woman{G3588}; but{G235} the woman{G1135} for{G1223} the man{G3588}.
For{G1223} this cause{G5124} ought{G3784} the woman{G3588} to have{G2192} power{G1849} on{G1909} her head{G3588} because of{G1223} the angels{G3588}.
Nevertheless{G4133} neither{G3777} is the man{G435} without{G5565} the woman{G1135}, neither{G3777} the woman{G1135} without{G5565} the man{G435}, in{G1722} the Lord{G2962}.
For{G1063} as{G5618} the woman{G3588} is of{G1537} the man{G3588}, even so{G3779} is the man{G3588} also{G2532} by{G1223} the woman{G3588}; but{G1161} all things{G3956} of{G1537} God{G3588}.
Judge{G2919} in{G1722} yourselves{G5213}: is it{G2076} comely{G4241} that a woman{G1135} pray{G4336} unto God{G3588} uncovered{G177}?

Doth{G2228} not{G3761}even{G3303} nature{G3588} itself{G846} teach{G1321} you{G5209}, that{G3754}, if{G1437} a man{G435} have long hair{G2863}, it is{G2076} a shame{G819} unto him{G846}?NOTE! Extra word: "autei"
But{G1161} if{G1437} a woman{G1135} have long hair{G2863}, it is{G2076} a glory{G1391} to her{G846}: for{G3754} her hair{G3588} is given{G1325} her{G846} for{G473} a covering{G4018}.
But{G1161} if{G1487} any man{G5100} seem{G1380} to be{G1511} contentious{G5380}, we{G2249} have{G2192} no{G3756} such{G5108} custom{G4914}, neither{G3761} the churches{G3588} of God{G3588}.

Now{G1161} in this{G5124} that I declare{G3853} unto you I praise{G1867} you not{G3756}, that{G3754} ye come together{G4905} not{G3756} for{G1519} the better{G2909}, but{G235} for{G1519} the worse{G2276}.

For{G1063} first of all{G4412}, when{G3303} ye{G5216} come together{G4905} in{G1722} the church{G3588}, I hear{G191} that there be{G5225} divisions{G4978} among{G1722} you{G5213}; and{G2532} I{G4100} partly{G3313} believe{G4100} it{G5100}.

For{G1063} there{G1511} must{G1163} be{G1511} also{G2532} heresies{G139} among{G1722} you{G5213}, that{G2443} they which{G3588} are approved{G1384} may be made{G1096} manifest{G5318} among{G1722} you{G5213}.
When{G4905} ye{G5216} come together{G4905} therefore{G3767} into{G1909} one place{G846}, this is{G2076} not{G3756} to eat{G5315} the Lord's{G2960} supper{G1173}.
For{G1063} in{G1722} eating{G5315} every one{G1538} taketh before{G4301} other his own{G2398} supper{G1173}: and{G2532} one{G3739} is hungry{G3983}, and{G1161} another{G3739} is drunken{G3184}.

What{G1063}? have ye{G2192} not{G3756} houses{G3614} to{G1519} eat{G2068} and{G2532} to drink in{G4095}? or{G2228} despise ye{G2706} the church{G3588} of God{G3588}, and{G2532} shame{G2617} them{G3588} that have{G2192} not{G3361}? What{G5101} shall I say{G2036} to you{G5213}? shall I praise{G1867} you{G5209} in{G1722} this{G5129}? I praise{G1867} you not{G3756}.

For{G1063} I{G1473} have received{G3880} of{G575} the Lord{G3588} that which{G3739} also{G2532} I delivered{G3860} unto you{G5213}, That{G3754} the Lord{G3588} Jesus{G2424} the same night{G3588} in{G1722} which{G3739} he was betrayed{G3860} took{G2983} bread{G740}:

And{G2532} when he had given thanks{G2168}, he brake{G2806} it, and{G2532} said{G2036}, Take{G2983}, eat{G5315}: this{G5124} is{G2076} my{G3450} body{G3588}, which is broken{G2806} for{G5228} you{G5216}: this{G5124} do{G4160} in{G1519} remembrance{G364} of me{G1699}.

After the same manner{G5615} also{G2532} he took the cup{G3588}, when{G3326} he had supped{G1172}, saying{G3004}, This{G5124} cup{G3588} is{G2076} the new{G2537} testament{G1242} in{G1722} my{G1699} blood{G129}: this{G5124} do ye{G4160}, as oft{G3740} as ye drink{G4095} it, in{G1519} remembrance{G364} of me{G1699}.

For{G1063} as often as{G3740} ye eat{G2068} this{G5126} bread{G3588}, and{G2532} drink{G4095} this{G5124} cup{G3588}, ye do shew{G2605} the Lord's{G3588} death{G3588} till{G891} he come{G2064}.UNSURE: Tagging of last particle "an"

Wherefore{G5620} whosoever{G3739} shall eat{G2068} this{G5126} bread{G3588}, and{G2228} drink{G4095} this cup{G3588} of the Lord{G3588}, unworthily{G371}, shall be{G2071} guilty of{G1777} the body{G3588} and{G2532} blood{G129} of the Lord{G3588}.
But{G1161} let{G1381} a man{G444} examine{G1381} himself{G1438}, and{G2532} so{G3779} let him eat{G2068} of{G1537} that bread{G3588}, and{G2532} drink{G4095} of{G1537} that cup{G3588}.

For{G1063} he{G3588} that eateth{G2068} and{G2532} drinketh{G4095} unworthily{G371}, eateth{G2068} and{G2532} drinketh{G4095} damnation{G2917} to himself{G1438}, not{G3361} discerning{G1252} the Lord's{G3588} body{G3588}.
For{G1223} this cause{G5124} many{G4183} are weak{G772} and{G2532} sickly{G732} among{G1722} you{G5213}, and{G2532} many{G2425} sleep{G2837}.
For{G1063} if{G1487} we would judge{G1252} ourselves{G1438}, we should{G2919} not{G3756} be judged{G2919}.
But{G1161} when we are judged{G2919}, we are chastened{G3811} of{G5259} the Lord{G2962}, that{G2443} we should{G2632} not{G3361} be condemned{G2632} with{G4862} the world{G3588}.
Wherefore{G5620}, my{G3450} brethren{G80}, when ye come together{G4905} to{G1519} eat{G5315}, tarry one{G1551} for another{G240}.

And{G1161} if{G1487} any man{G5100} hunger{G3983}, let him eat{G2068} at{G1722} home{G3624}; that{G2443} ye come{G4905} not{G3361} together{G4905} unto{G1519} condemnation{G2917}. And{G1161} the rest{G3062} will I set in order{G1299} when{G5613} I come{G2064}.
